data.message: Marshall Mathers just lost the respect of a big chunk of his fan base. What an infantile display of emotion and abuse of the power of his gift. He is talented and I've always been a fan of his music, but I really am disgusted that he's become a part of the problem. We don't need your personal feelings and opinion to strengthen the divide. Asshole. Use your influence in a positive way like you have in the past.

replies.message: He actually didn't, he just distanced himself from  you deplorables because he KNOWS that a segment of his fanbase has fucked up views, this was very deliberate & he's not taking y'all shit anymore! Cry him a river sis 🤷🏽‍♀️
And he just gained a whole new following. 😘
He doesn't care about fascist Nazis being his fans!

Gina Moretto Wright *raises hand* <-(in general not a rap fan)
*raises mother's hand* <-(she hates swearing and has never been convinced to listen to rap before)
He didnt lose my respect. You know damn well you never listened to EM so please keep it moving.
He actually just added a mature billion who will fight for and appreciated Democracy.  This tumor has to go
At a net worth of 190 million...I don't think he gives a shit.
